title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Personal Insolvency Act 2012 

(Prescribed Debt Relief Notice Application Form) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited personal insolvency act 2012 (prescribed debt relief notice application form) regulation 2022

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 2. The form set out in the Schedule to these Regulations is hereby
text_raw:
2. The form set out in the Schedule to these Regulations is hereby 
prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012 
(No. 44 of 2012).
text_norm: 2 form set schedule regulation hereby prescribed purpose section 29(2) personal insolvency act 2012 (no 44 2012)

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 3. The Personal Insolvency Act 2012 (Prescribed Debt Relief Notice
text_raw:
3. The Personal Insolvency Act 2012 (Prescribed Debt Relief Notice 
Application Form) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 333 of 2013) and the Personal 
Insolvency Act 2012 (Prescribed Debt Relief Notice Application Form) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 18 of 2022) are hereby revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd May, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [215] 3 

Schedule 

ISI Case Reference No.: 

APPLICATION FOR DEBT RELIEF NOTICE 

AN CHÚIRT CHUARDA 

THE CIRCUIT COURT 

[…………] CIRCUIT 

 COUNTY OF [……….] 

IN THE MATTER OF AN APPLICATION UNDER SECTION 31 OF THE 
PERSONAL INSOLVENCY ACT 2012 

AND IN THE MATTER OF [………………………………….] OF 
[……………………………………………………..], 

A DEBTOR 

I ………………………………………………………… 

of …………………………………………………………………. 

County of ………………………………………………………… 

HEREBY APPLY for the making of an order for the issue under section 31(2)(a) 
of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012 of a Debt Relief Notice in respect of the 
debts specified in the application under section 29 of the said Act which the 
Court is satisfied are qualifying debts. 

Dated ………….20….. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [215] 

ISI Case Reference No.: 

Important Information and Statements

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 1. Unless otherwise defined in this application form, terms used herein have the
text_raw:
1. Unless otherwise defined in this application form, terms used herein have the 
same meaning as under the Personal Insolvency Act 2012 (the “Act”).
text_norm: 1 unless otherwise defined application form term used herein meaning personal insolvency act 2012 (the act )

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 2. This application form has been prescribed by the Insolvency Service for the
text_raw:
2. This application form has been prescribed by the Insolvency Service for the 
purposes of Section 29(2) of the Act.
text_norm: 2 application form prescribed insolvency service purpose section 29(2) act

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 3. The Insolvency Service may request any further information it requires from
text_raw:
3. The Insolvency Service may request any further information it requires from 
an approved intermediary and defer further consideration of the application until 
such information is furnished to the Insolvency Service. Failure to furnish such 
information, within 14 days or such longer period as the Insolvency Service may 
(at its discretion) permit, will mean that the application shall be deemed to have 
been withdrawn.
text_norm: 3 insolvency service may request information requires approved intermediary defer consideration application information furnished insolvency service failure furnish information within 14 day longer period insolvency service may (at discretion) permit mean application shall deemed withdrawn

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 4. Where a debtor (the “Debtor”) becomes aware of any inaccuracy or omission
text_raw:
4. Where a debtor (the “Debtor”) becomes aware of any inaccuracy or omission 
in this application or any document accompanying this application, or any 
material change in his or her circumstances between the date of the application 
and the date on which the application is reviewed by the appropriate court, he or 
she is required under section 29(3) of the Act to inform the approved 
intermediary of these facts as soon as practicable. An approved intermediary 
who receives such information is required under section 29(4) of the Act to 
furnish that information to the Insolvency Service without delay.
text_norm: 4 debtor (the debtor ) becomes aware inaccuracy omission application document accompanying application material change circumstance date application date application reviewed appropriate court required section 29(3) act inform approved intermediary fact soon practicable approved intermediary receives information required section 29(4) act furnish information insolvency service without delay

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 5. The Insolvency Service shall process the Debtor’s personal data in accordance
text_raw:
5. The Insolvency Service shall process the Debtor’s personal data in accordance 
with its Privacy Notice which is available on its website, www.isi.gov.ie.
text_norm: 5 insolvency service shall process debtor personal data accordance privacy notice available website www.isi.gov.ie

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 6. The Insolvency Service hereby agrees to the Debtor communicating with the
text_raw:
6. The Insolvency Service hereby agrees to the Debtor communicating with the 
Insolvency Service by electronic means for the purposes of any communication 
or notice required or permitted to be sent or given by the Debtor to the Insolvency 
Service, from time to time, in connection with this Act including for the purpose 
of any notice referred to in section 134 of the Act. Any such communication or 
notice should be sent to drn@isi.gov.ie.
text_norm: 6 insolvency service hereby agrees debtor communicating insolvency service electronic mean purpose communication notice required permitted sent given debtor insolvency service time time connection act including purpose notice referred section 134 act communication notice sent drn isi.gov.ie

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 7. Notwithstanding any agreement by the Debtor to receiving electronic
text_raw:
7. Notwithstanding any agreement by the Debtor to receiving electronic 
communications and notices, there may be circumstances in which the 
Insolvency Service will send documents, information and other communications 
to the Debtor in hard copy rather than electronically, in which case the 
Insolvency Service reserves the right to do so, including for the purpose of giving 
the Debtor any notice referred to in section 134 of the Act.
text_norm: 7 notwithstanding agreement debtor receiving electronic communication notice may circumstance insolvency service send document information communication debtor hard copy rather electronically case insolvency service reserve right including purpose giving debtor notice referred section 134 act

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 8. This application may be withdrawn at any time prior to the issue of a Debt
text_raw:
8. This application may be withdrawn at any time prior to the issue of a Debt 
Relief Notice in accordance with section 29(5) of the Act.
text_norm: 8 application may withdrawn time prior issue debt relief notice accordance section 29(5) act

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: 9. This application shall be accompanied by the prescribed fee and the following
text_raw:
9. This application shall be accompanied by the prescribed fee and the following 
documentation - 

(a) a copy of the statement made by the approved intermediary under 

section 27(6) of the Act; 

(b) 

the Debtor’s signed confirmation that he or she satisfies the 
eligibility criteria specified in section 26(2) of the Act; 

ISI Case Reference No.: 

 
 
 [215] 5 

(c) 

the Prescribed Financial Statement completed under section 27 of 
the Act and a statutory declaration of the Debtor confirming that 
the statement is a complete and accurate statement of the Debtor’s 
assets, liabilities, income and expenditure; 

(d) a schedule of the creditors of the Debtor and the debts concerned, 
stating in relation to each such creditor the information specified 
in section 29(2)(d) of the Act; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

the Debtor’s written consent to the disclosure and processing of 
his or her personal data as specified in section 29(2)(e) of the Act; 

the Debtor’s written consent to the making of any enquiry under 
section 30 of the Act relating to the Debtor by the Insolvency 
Service; 

the Debtor’s signed statement stating whether, to the best of his 
or her knowledge, there is any judgment or court order in force 
against him or her which relates to a debt which is a qualifying 
debt; 

(h) 

such other documentation as may be requested in this application.

Note: This document will be completed in electronic format on such electronic 
platform that the Insolvency Service may from time to time make available or 
otherwise specify for such purpose, following which, the information will be 
processed into an output format which may be in electronic form or printed on paper. 
Where any item in this document is completed to the effect of ‘no’, or any item in this 
document is not completed, that information may not appear on such output format 
and any person reviewing the output format should proceed on the basis that, where 
the output format does not refer to such information, the relevant item was either 
completed by selecting ‘no’ or the relevant item was not applicable in that instance. 
In this document, where an asterisk (*) is used and a choice is provided of the 
appropriate response, the response selected will appear in the output format. This 
note will not appear on the output format.

title: prescribed for the purposes of section 29(2) of the Personal Insolvency Act 2012
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations prescribe the form to be used when making an application to 
the Insolvency Service of Ireland for a Debt Relief Notice. These Regulations 
also revoke the Personal Insolvency Act 2012 (Prescribed Debt Relief Notice 
Application Form) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 333 of 2013) and the Personal 
Insolvency Act 2012 (Prescribed Debt Relief Notice Application Form) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 18 of 2022). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [215] 19
